text: Approval for the self-tightening slipknot (sts) modification to the angio-seal vascular closure device.  The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name angio-seal vascular closure device: self-tightening slipknot (sts) and is indicated for closing and reducing the time to hemostasis at the femoral arterial puncture site in patients who have undertone a diagnostic angiographic procedure or an interventional procedure using an 8french procedural sheath for the 8f angio-seal sts device and a 6f or smaller procedural sheath for the 6f angio-seal sts device.
